summary: This document details the portfolio activity of Southern Trust Company, Inc. for the period of July 1, 2013, to July 31, 2013, specifically focusing on foreign exchange transactions involving New Zealand dollars. It outlines inflows and outflows, including specific transaction amounts and exchange rates.
keyFacts: The document records foreign exchange transactions for Southern Trust Company, Inc. during July 2013.
It includes a significant inflow of 3,040,570.00 USD from a currency transaction on July 25, 2013.
There are multiple outflows totaling 3,040,570.00 USD from currency transactions on July 25, 2013.
The exchange rates for the transactions are provided, indicating the value of the New Zealand dollar against the USD.
No named individuals are mentioned in the document.
